title: Monotype Imaging is conducting a brand awareness study
content:
Monotype Imaging has put together a series of three brief (five question) surveys regarding the ITC, Linotype and Monotype brands. We invite you to take one or all of the surveys. We truly value your opinion and appreciate your support in telling us what you think.

ITC survey  
 [https://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=fBX5QgtH8sVHZa\_2bhemQllQ\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220355/https:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=fBX5QgtH8sVHZa_2bhemQllQ_3d_3d)

Monotype survey  
 [https://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=6NbXA3oSjbE5yZZzRqzsjw\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220355/https:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=6NbXA3oSjbE5yZZzRqzsjw_3d_3d)

Linotype survey  
 [https://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=NTTs3gXA2Y\_2fITxO3BC4MfQ\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220355/https:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=NTTs3gXA2Y_2fITxO3BC4MfQ_3d_3d)
author: dan_reynolds
